name: Abrade
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Abrade deals 3 damage to target creature.
• Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text:
"What do you mean a walking clock destroyed all our cannons?!"
—Captain Lannery Storm

name: Acolyte of Aclazotz
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice another creature or artifact: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "Great Aclazotz, receive this offering. Wrought with skill. Captured with strength. Anointed with the blood of your enemies."

name: Acrobatic Leap
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. Untap it.
flavor_text: As the cliff began to crumble, Wayta danced fearlessly across the tumbling stones, knowing Ajij would never let her fall.

name: Adaptive Gemguard
oracle_text: Tap two untapped artifacts and/or creatures you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on Adaptive Gemguard. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: Left their own devices, gnomes reengineer their own devices.

name: Ancestors' Aid
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text:
"You surface-dwellers may have forgotten your history, but it has not forgotten you."
—Akal Pakal, First Steward of Oteclan

name: Ancestral Reminiscence
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.
flavor_text: A typical conversation with Echoes is three parts wisdom and one part gossip.

name: Another Chance
oracle_text: You may mill two cards. Then return up to two creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill two cards, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: The pull of duty was so strong that they barely paused to notice they'd died.

name: Armored Kincaller
oracle_text: When Armored Kincaller enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Dinosaur card from your hand. If you do or if you control another Dinosaur, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text:
"She's devoted to protecting her herd. We're just lucky she considers us part of it."
—Huatli

name: Attentive Sunscribe
oracle_text: Whenever Attentive Sunscribe becomes tapped, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
flavor_text: Few humans are steady-handed enough to match a gnome's precision. Even the slightest change to a single line can wildly alter a glyph's meaning.

name: Basking Capybara
oracle_text: Descend 4 — Basking Capybara gets +3/+0 as long as there are four or more permanent cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Even our most learned philosophers can only hope to approach the inner serenity of the humble capybara."
—Nelli, Oltec didact

name: Brackish Blunder
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. If it was tapped, create a Map token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.")
flavor_text: When the Malamet told him to avoid the river, he thought they meant it wasn't safe to drink.

name: Brazen Blademaster
oracle_text: Whenever Brazen Blademaster attacks while you control two or more artifacts, it gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The secret is footwork. Plus an extra sword."

name: Broodrage Mycoid
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if you descended this turn, create a 1/1 black Fungus creature token with "This creature can't block." (You descended if a permanent card was put into your graveyard from anywhere.)
flavor_text: As the massive mycoids known as rage titans charge into battle, lesser ones swarm in their wake, gobbling up any survivors.

name: Buried Treasure
oracle_text:
{T}, Sacrifice Buried Treasure: Add one mana of any color.
{5}, Exile Buried Treasure from your graveyard: Discover 5. Activate only as a sorcery. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 5 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

name: Burning Sun Cavalry
oracle_text: Whenever Burning Sun Cavalry attacks or blocks while you control a Dinosaur, Burning Sun Cavalry gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "By fire and lightning, tooth and claw, we will send these invaders fleeing back to Torrezon!"

name: Captivating Cave
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Captivating Cave: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

name: Cartographer's Companion
oracle_text: When Cartographer's Companion enters the battlefield, create a Map token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.")
flavor_text: Ever since the Fomori's attempt long ago to extinguish Chimil's light, the Oltec have taken extensive measures to never get lost in the Core.

name: Cavern Stomper
oracle_text:
When Cavern Stomper enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)
{3}{G}: Cavern Stomper can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.

name: Child of the Volcano
oracle_text:
Trample
At the beginning of your end step, if you descended this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Child of the Volcano. (You descended if a permanent card was put into your graveyard from anywhere.)
flavor_text: It is a living eruption, unquenchable fury given form.

name: Cogwork Wrestler
oracle_text:
Flash
When Cogwork Wrestler enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Years of adventure and adversity on the open seas did not prepare Brog for the humiliation of losing a sparring match to a cogwork doll less than half his size.

name: Compass Gnome
oracle_text: When Compass Gnome enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card or Cave card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
flavor_text:
"I'm certain it's some kind of sophisticated navigational tool. If only I had any idea what it was telling me!"
—Colbo, Brazen Coalition surveyor

name: Cosmium Blast
oracle_text: Cosmium Blast deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: Cosmium is the tangible essence of Chimil's power. The Oltec's cosmium-laced tattoos ensure that power can be called upon when needed.

name: Daring Discovery
oracle_text:
Up to three target creatures can't block this turn.
Discover 4. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 4 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

name: Dead Weight
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
flavor_text: The hired goblins were not, as advertised, worth their weight in gold.

name: Deathcap Marionette
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
When Deathcap Marionette enters the battlefield, you may mill two cards. (You may put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: Mycoids have no concept of life or death. All things exist, and all things can be made useful.

name: Deconstruction Hammer
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has "{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Deconstruction Hammer: Destroy target artifact or enchantment."
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text:
"All that is made can be unmade. Chimil's light is the only constant."
—Oltec artificers' creed

name: Deep Goblin Skulltaker
oracle_text:
Menace
At the beginning of your end step, if you descended this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Deep Goblin Skulltaker. (You descended if a permanent card was put into your graveyard from anywhere.)
flavor_text: "Go away! I found it first!"

name: Didact Echo
oracle_text:
When Didact Echo enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Descend 4 — Didact Echo has flying as long as there are four or more permanent cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text: The folk of the Sun Empire respect their ancestors. The Oltec go further, communing with spirits of esteemed elders after death.

name: Dinotomaton
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Dinotomaton enters the battlefield, target creature you control gains menace until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Oh, Saheeli would *love* you."
—Huatli

name: Disruptor Wanderglyph
oracle_text: Whenever Disruptor Wanderglyph attacks, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard.
flavor_text: Wherever the spores begin to take hold, it crushes the ground to rubble.

name: Disturbed Slumber
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target land you control becomes a 4/4 Dinosaur creature with reach and haste. It's still a land. It must be blocked this turn if able.
flavor_text: "I'm telling you, the wall just blinked!"

name: Echo of Dusk
oracle_text: Descend 4 — As long as there are four or more permanent cards in your graveyard, Echo of Dusk gets +1/+1 and has lifelink.
flavor_text:
"It's a mournful fate, to remember so well the taste of blood yet be forever unable to drink."
—Bartolomé del Presidio, director of the Queen's Bay Company

name: Envoy of Okinec Ahau
oracle_text: {4}{W}: Create a 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature token.
flavor_text: Though wary of each other at first, the Malamet and the Oltec found a common enemy in the mycoids. They began to share glyph knowledge and other crafting secrets.

name: Etali's Favor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature you control
When Etali's Favor enters the battlefield, discover 3. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 3 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.

name: Family Reunion
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
• Creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: Huatli smiled up at Akal. "Our peoples have too long been parted, and yet we are cousins still."

name: Fanatical Offering
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Draw two cards and create a Map token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.")
flavor_text: The gateway could be opened only by the spilling of innocent blood. Vito did not hesitate.

name: Frilled Cave-Wurm
oracle_text: Descend 4 — Frilled Cave-Wurm gets +2/+0 as long as there are four or more permanent cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Remember that weird salamander thing we found in the jungle stream? I think we just met its god."
—Carella, quartermaster of the *Windshark*

name: Fungal Fortitude
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0.
When enchanted creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control.

name: Glorifier of Suffering
oracle_text: When Glorifier of Suffering enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature or artifact. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
flavor_text: "Everyone wants to be remembered. Few are willing to do what it takes."

name: Goblin Tomb Raider
oracle_text: As long as you control an artifact, Goblin Tomb Raider gets +1/+0 and has haste.
flavor_text: Enterprising goblins can extract their body weight in loot. Ambitious ones have a big meal first.

name: Greedy Freebooter
oracle_text: When Greedy Freebooter dies, scry 1 and create a Treasure token. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom. A Treasure token is an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: Neither Nurgam nor the mycoid who laid the trap could quite believe their luck.

oracle_text:
Hidden Cataract enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
{4}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Hidden Cataract: Discover 4. Activate only as a sorcery. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 4 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

oracle_text:
Hidden Courtyard enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
{4}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Hidden Courtyard: Discover 4. Activate only as a sorcery. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 4 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

oracle_text:
Hidden Necropolis enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
{4}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Hidden Necropolis: Discover 4. Activate only as a sorcery. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 4 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

oracle_text:
Hidden Nursery enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
{4}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Hidden Nursery: Discover 4. Activate only as a sorcery. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 4 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

name: Hidden Volcano
oracle_text:
Hidden Volcano enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
{4}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Hidden Volcano: Discover 4. Activate only as a sorcery. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 4 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

name: Hotfoot Gnome
oracle_text:
Haste
{T}: Another target creature gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: As the surface-dwellers became bolder in their intrusions, Oltec artificers began to repurpose courier gnomes for intelligence gathering and distraction.

name: Huatli's Final Strike
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls.
flavor_text:
"Inti's name will grace our poems and histories for generations. Yours will collect dust, forgotten, in this cave."
—Huatli, to Vito

name: Hunter's Blowgun
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Equipped creature has deathtouch as long as it's your turn. Otherwise, it has reach.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text:
"Ow! I think a wasp just stung me, cap'n."
—Nirk Doobin, last words

name: Idol of the Deep King // Sovereign's Macuahuitl

card_faces.oracle_text:
Flash
When Idol of the Deep King enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target.
Craft with artifact {2}{R} ({2}{R}, Exile this artifact, Exile another artifact you control or an artifact card from your graveyard: Return this card transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.)

card_faces.oracle_text:
When Sovereign's Macuahuitl enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: In the Presence of Ages
oracle_text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card and/or a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Finally, those glowing purple bone-monsters are gone and we can get back to the real excitement: archaeology!"
—Quintorius Kand

card_faces.name: Inverted Iceberg
card_faces.oracle_text:
When Inverted Iceberg enters the battlefield, mill a card, then draw a card. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
Craft with artifact {4}{U}{U} ({4}{U}{U}, Exile this artifact, Exile another artifact you control or an artifact card from your graveyard: Return this card transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.)

card_faces.name: Iceberg Titan
card_faces.oracle_text: Whenever Iceberg Titan attacks, you may tap or untap target artifact or creature.
card_faces.flavor_text: The force of a blizzard. The rage of a monstrosaur.

name: Ironpaw Aspirant
oracle_text: When Ironpaw Aspirant enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text:
"Train your mind and your muscles with equal ferocity, cub. Without wisdom, even a mighty warrior is nothing but a bully."
—Sovereign Okinec Ahau

name: Join the Dead
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.
Descend 4 — That creature gets -10/-10 until end of turn instead if there are four or more permanent cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text: The more creatures that plunge to their deaths in the abyss, the more angry Echoes that arise to drag others down.

card_faces.name: Kaslem's Stonetree
card_faces.oracle_text:
When Kaslem's Stonetree enters the battlefield, look at the top six cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.
Craft with Cave {5}{G} ({5}{G}, Exile this artifact, Exile a Cave you control or a Cave card from your graveyard: Return this card transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.)

card_faces.name: Kaslem's Strider
card_faces.flavor_text: The Oltec long ago abandoned the caverns to the mycoids, but the Deep Gods still keep watch over the spore-strewn darkness.

name: Malamet Brawler
oracle_text: Whenever Malamet Brawler attacks, target attacking creature gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I bear the marking of the Deep King, and in his name I will rend you to nothing but spores on the wind!"

name: Malamet Scythe
oracle_text:
Flash
When Malamet Scythe enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.
Equipped creature gets +2/+2.
Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Malamet Veteran
oracle_text:
Trample
Descend 4 — Whenever Malamet Veteran attacks, if there are four or more permanent cards in your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: The mightiest Malamet warriors train as titan-killers, elite champions capable of facing down the caverns' most fearsome beasts.

name: Marauding Brinefang
oracle_text:
Ward {3} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {3}.)
Islandcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
flavor_text: Ancient glyphs are a lot harder to decipher when attached to an apex predator.

name: Mephitic Draught
oracle_text: When Mephitic Draught enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text:
"Don't look at me. I'm not drinking it."
—Dranach, Dire Fleet boatswain

name: Miner's Guidewing
oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance
When Miner's Guidewing dies, target creature you control explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Mineshaft Spider
oracle_text:
Reach
When Mineshaft Spider enters the battlefield, you may mill two cards. (You may put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: Anything that falls into the pit—relics, rubble, even corpses—ends up snared in its magic-infused web.

name: Nurturing Bristleback
oracle_text:
When Nurturing Bristleback enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token.
Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Oaken Siren
oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance
{T}: Add {U}. Spend this mana only to cast an artifact spell or activate an ability of an artifact source.
flavor_text: The ship's carpenter adorned the figurehead with a small cosmium gem, never expecting the figurehead to take flight.

name: Oltec Archaeologists
oracle_text:
When Oltec Archaeologists enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Oltec Cloud Guard
oracle_text:
Flying
When Oltec Cloud Guard enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature token.
flavor_text: Many Oltec youth dream of one day joining the elite bat-riding cavalry of the Thousand Moons military force.

name: Orazca Puzzle-Door
oracle_text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Orazca Puzzle-Door: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
flavor_text: Between Quintorius's archaeological expertise and Huatli's knowledge of ancient glyphs, the "impossible" lock finally yielded, and the door to the underground world rumbled open.

card_faces.name: Oteclan Landmark
card_faces.oracle_text:
When Oteclan Landmark enters the battlefield, scry 2.
Craft with artifact {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Exile this artifact, Exile another artifact you control or an artifact card from your graveyard: Return this card transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.)

card_faces.name: Oteclan Levitator
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Oteclan Levitator attacks, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.
card_faces.flavor_text: Dusk Legion invaders sought lone Oltec travelers to prey upon. The Core's guidestones did not approve.

name: Out of Air
oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a creature spell.
Counter target spell.
flavor_text:
"The Core is not a simple trove to be plundered by intruders from the surface. It will reject those who do not accord it respect."
—Akal Pakal, First Steward of Oteclan

name: Over the Edge
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
• Target creature you control explores, then it explores again. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard. Then repeat this process.)

name: Panicked Altisaur
oracle_text:
Reach
{T}: Panicked Altisaur deals 2 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: Early Sun Empire expeditions learned the hard way that some surface dinosaurs were particularly ill-suited to the caverns' enclosed environments.

name: Pathfinding Axejaw
oracle_text: When Pathfinding Axejaw enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: When you don't know what dangers you'll face, bring the biggest danger with you.

name: Petrify
oracle_text:
Enchant artifact or creature
Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
flavor_text: Those who break the laws of the Malamet become cold, silent warnings to others who might try.

name: Pirate Hat
flavor_text: "Landlubbers just don't understand the value of a proper hat."

name: Plundering Pirate
oracle_text: When Plundering Pirate enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: "Whatever it is, it set off a trap. It must be valuable!"

name: Poison Dart Frog
oracle_text:
Reach
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{2}: Poison Dart Frog gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Bright as any dinosaur—and just as with other great hunters, its colors are a warning."
—Huatli

name: Primordial Gnawer
oracle_text: When Primordial Gnawer dies, discover 3. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 3 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)
flavor_text: Cave crawlers devour anything from plant matter to solid rock, but they prefer fresh meat.

name: Promising Vein
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Promising Vein: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: United under the banner of the Brazen Coalition, pirates put aside their feuds to plunder the underground bounty.

name: Quicksand Whirlpool
oracle_text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a tapped creature.
Exile target creature.
flavor_text:
"Those who would steal the blood and breath of the living will drink their fill of the sand."
—Sovereign Okinec Ahau

name: Rampaging Spiketail
oracle_text:
When Rampaging Spiketail enters the battlefield, target creature you control gets +2/+0 and gains indestructible until end of turn.
Swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Ray of Ruin
oracle_text: Exile target creature, Vehicle, or nonbasic land. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
flavor_text:
"We know Chimil's light as a warming, healing presence, but make no mistake: to those who would desecrate her lands, it is a terrible force of scouring fury."
—Akal Pakal, First Steward of Oteclan

name: Relic's Roar
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target artifact or creature becomes a Dinosaur artifact creature with base power and toughness 4/3 in addition to its other types.
flavor_text:
"Well, that's one less share to divide up."
—Dranach, Dire Fleet boatswain

Vigilance
When River Herald Guide enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

name: River Herald Scout
oracle_text: When River Herald Scout enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: "Don't worry, little swimmers. I'm here for the ruins, not you."

name: Rumbling Rockslide
oracle_text: Rumbling Rockslide deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.
flavor_text: Sometimes an expedition reaches a natural conclusion. Sometimes it all just comes crashing down.

Flash
When Runaway Boulder enters the battlefield, it deals 6 damage to target creature an opponent controls.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Sage of Days
oracle_text: When Sage of Days enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may put one of those cards back on top of your library. Put the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text: "After this age, another."

name: Screaming Phantom
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Screaming Phantom attacks, mill a card. (Put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

name: Seeker of Sunlight

flavor_text: "We weren't fleeing a broken world. We were running toward paradise!"

name: Seismic Monstrosaur

Trample
{2}{R}, Sacrifice a land: Draw a card.
Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Shipwreck Sentry
oracle_text:
Defender
As long as an artifact entered the battlefield under your control this turn, Shipwreck Sentry can attack as though it didn't have defender.
flavor_text: "That's close enough, stranger."

name: Skullcap Snail
oracle_text: When Skullcap Snail enters the battlefield, target opponent exiles a card from their hand.
flavor_text:
"Oh, come on! Aren't regular snails gross enough?"
—Derilene, expedition porter

name: Soaring Sandwing
oracle_text:
Flying
When Soaring Sandwing enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
Plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Song of Stupefaction
oracle_text:
Enchant creature or Vehicle
When Song of Stupefaction enters the battlefield, you may mill two cards. (You may put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)
Fathomless descent — Enchanted permanent gets -X/-0, where X is the number of permanent cards in your graveyard.

name: Staggering Size
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Ah well... the temple was due for a new roof anyhow."
—Kusi, Oltec gardener

name: Sunfire Torch
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, you may sacrifice Sunfire Torch. When you do, this creature deals 2 damage to any target."
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: "Let Tilonalli's light burn a path through this darkness."

name: Sunshot Militia
oracle_text: Tap two untapped artifacts and/or creatures you control: Sunshot Militia deals 1 damage to each opponent. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: As the Legion of Dusk closed in, Oltec citizens rallied to support the Thousand Moons and drive off the invaders.

name: Tectonic Hazard
oracle_text: Tectonic Hazard deals 1 damage to each opponent and each creature they control.
flavor_text:
"The ground is on fire, the ceiling's made of spears, and I think a mushroom tried to curse me. Don't tell me not to panic!"
—Jino Grag, Brazen Coalition scout

name: Thousand Moons Crackshot
oracle_text: Whenever Thousand Moons Crackshot attacks, you may pay {2}{W}. When you do, tap target creature.
flavor_text: The Thousand Moons practice every maneuver thousands of times, allowing them to strike flawlessly without hesitation in the heat of battle.

name: Thousand Moons Infantry
oracle_text: Untap Thousand Moons Infantry during each other player's untap step.
flavor_text: The Thousand Moons train and fight in tight-knit squads of ten. Every tenth Moon functions as an officer, every hundredth as a captain, and the thousandth, Anim Pakal, as supreme commander.

name: Tinker's Tote
oracle_text:
When Tinker's Tote enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature tokens.
{W}, Sacrifice Tinker's Tote: You gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Never leave home without a gnome.

card_faces.name: Tithing Blade
card_faces.oracle_text:
When Tithing Blade enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
Craft with creature {4}{B} ({4}{B}, Exile this artifact, Exile a creature you control or a creature card from your graveyard: Return this card transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.)

card_faces.name: Consuming Sepulcher
card_faces.oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
card_faces.flavor_text:
"Slake my thirst so that we both may be free."
—Faded inscription

name: Unlucky Drop
oracle_text: Target artifact or creature's owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
flavor_text:
"First rule down here is the same as it is on the water: always double-check your knots."
—Captain Lannery Storm

name: Vito's Inquisitor
oracle_text: {B}, Sacrifice another creature or artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on Vito's Inquisitor. It gains menace until end of turn.
flavor_text: "We usher in the Age of Everflowing Blood, when those who are fed upon will be fed, and those who feed will be satiated."

name: Volatile Wanderglyph
oracle_text: Whenever Volatile Wanderglyph becomes tapped, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text: Touched eons ago by Ojer Axonil's flaming macuahuitl, it still burns with his boundless fury.

name: Walk with the Ancestors
oracle_text: Return up to one target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. Discover 4. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 4 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

name: Waterwind Scout
oracle_text:
Flying
When Waterwind Scout enters the battlefield, create a Map token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.")

name: Waylaying Pirates
oracle_text: When Waylaying Pirates enters the battlefield, if you control an artifact, tap target artifact or creature an opponent controls and put a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)
flavor_text: "The only drink in your future is seawater."
